name: SkullZ (Acropolise)
description:
The game SkullZ checks your reflex, combined with your focus and aim skills.

You have to dodge the enemies, kill them, collecting items like HP, Coins, Weapons and more.

You always have to look on your back and be careful.

The game also combines an element of time, I dare you to get a high score with the lowest time possible!

Will you join the adventure?
